akas: Ghost Hunters: College Edition USA (working title)
akas from release info: Ghost Hunters: College Edition USA (working title)

1.title: The New Class
1.plot: School is back in session for Ghost Hunters Academy. In all-new episodes, eight new cadets are competing for one spot on TAPS and right away have to show off their investigation abilities at the Waverly Hills Sanatorium in Louisville, KY.

2.title: Crazy for Power
2.plot: Training is over and the time has come for the cadets to prove themselves as they travel to Trans-Allegheny Lunatic Asylum. With Steve and Tango watching from the sidelines, each team must investigate with the appointed leader at the helm. In the end, one team works cohesively as a unit and wins raves in the evaluation.

3.title: Dissension in the Ranks
3.plot: The competition heats up as the cadets travel to Hartford, CT to investigate the Mark Twain House. With only four investigations remaining, the margin of error has become razor thin, as the slightest of mistakes could send any of these investigators packing.

4.title: Island Castaway
4.plot: Only five cadets remain as the group travels to Fort Delaware, the civil war prison on Pea Patch Island. With an odd number of cadets left in the competition, Steve and Tango decide to have one team leader and let them call the shots.

5.title: Schooled at Shawshank
5.plot: With the competition almost complete, the four remaining cadets face their most daunting challenge, Mansfield Reformatory. Referred to by a former inmate as an "evil" place, Mansfield once housed Ohio's most heinous offenders. Now the cadets will investigate to see if the sprits of someone, or something, still lingers. Of all the TAPS qualities, honesty has never been called in question for any of the cadets... until now.

6.title: Finals at the Stanley Hote
6.plot: With a spot in TAPS so close within their grasp, the last remaining cadets head deep in the heart of the Rockies to face their steepest challenge in the Stanley Hotel, famously known as the inspiration of Stephen King's The Shining. In order to stand out on the final investigation, the cadets must pull out all the stops, and as a result collect some of the most astonishing evidence found all season.

1.title: Web of Deceit
1.plot: At the location of their first "classroom," the legendary Fort Mifflin, veteran instructors Steve Gonsalves and Dave Tango promise lots of hard work as the students learn how to gather information and properly review analysis in order to crack the case.

2.title: The Honeymoon's Over
2.plot: This week on Ghost Hunters Academy, Steve and Tango take the investigators-in-training down to North Carolina and put their skills to the test at the U.S.S. Carolina.

3.title: Back to Basics
3.plot: Things heat up on Ghost Hunters Academy as the group heads to Philadelphia to investigate the place where Al Capone did time at the Eastern State Penitentiary. But the students may be shaking in their boots from more than just ghosts this week, as Steve and Tango make an addition to the class.

4.title: Drama Queen
4.plot: When the class travels upstate to check out Buffalo Central Terminal this week, they receive a surprise drama lesson as they're put to the test dealing with conflict in the group.

5.title: The Blame Game
5.plot: Recruits have their work cut out for them on Ghost Hunters Academy as the team heads down to Florida to investigate the St. Augustine Lighthouse. Nerves kick in when there's an addition to the group, which means class is dismissed for one of the scholars.

6.title: Final Exams
6.plot: Everything the candidates have learned this semester is put to the test in their final investigation at the Essex County Asylum, the sprawling, abandoned infirmary that's supposedly home to the spirits of thousands who died within its now-decaying walls.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: School is back in session for Ghost Hunters Academy. In all-new episodes, eight new cadets are competing for one spot on TAPS and right away have to show off their investigation abilities at the Waverly Hills Sanatorium in Louisville, KY. Steve Gonsalves and Dave Tango are on board to show the new cadets the ropes, but tensions run high early on. One recruit repeatedly abandons their squad, opting to investigate solo, and alienates the team in the process. This season also features Ghost Hunters' Jason Hawes, who will assess each group's performance and eliminate a ...

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Training is over and the time has come for the cadets to prove themselves as they travel to Trans-Allegheny Lunatic Asylum. With Steve and Tango watching from the sidelines, each team must investigate with the appointed leader at the helm. In the end, one team works cohesively as a unit and wins raves in the evaluation. The other struggles with bickering and draws the ire of Tango, due to a bossy leader and huge technical gaffe that costs the team hard evidence. When Jason Hawes returns to eliminate another competitor, will he side with the embattled team leader or ...

imdb.plot outline: What does it take to be a top-notch paranormal investigator? Anybody can set up a few cameras and turn out the lights, but only a select few have the right stuff to really get to the bottom of the most puzzling supernatural phenomena. Ghost Hunters Academy features a group of aspiring ghost hunters exploring some of the most haunted locations in the country and around the world. Led by veteran ghost hunters and TAPS members Steve Gonsalves and Dave Tango, the recruits train, hands on, in the paranormal arts.
imdb.title: Ghost Hunters Academy
plot: What does it take to be a top-notch paranormal investigator? Anybody can set up a few cameras and turn out the lights, but only a select few have the right stuff to really get to the bottom of the most puzzling supernatural phenomena. _Ghost Hunters Academy_ (qv) features a group of aspiring ghost hunters exploring some of the most haunted locations in the country and around the world. Led by veteran ghost hunters and TAPS members Steve Gonsalves and Dave Tango, the recruits train, hands on, in the paranormal arts.
